categories.name: Daily Wisdom
categories.description: Practical spiritual guidance for everyday life

teachings.title: The Power of Present Moment
teachings.author: Vedic Wisdom
teachings.quote: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion
teachings.explanation: True peace and power are found when we anchor ourselves fully in the now, releasing attachment to past regrets and future anxieties.
teachings.practicalTip: Take three conscious breaths whenever you feel scattered, bringing your awareness back to this moment.

teachings.title: Inner Light Recognition
teachings.author: Upanishads
teachings.quote: You are the light of the world. Let your light shine before all beings
teachings.explanation: Each soul carries divine light within. Recognizing this truth transforms how we see ourselves and others.
teachings.practicalTip: Begin each day by acknowledging your inner divine nature through meditation or prayer.

teachings.title: Unity in Diversity
teachings.author: Universal Truth
teachings.quote: In the garden of humanity, every soul is a unique flower contributing to the beautiful whole
teachings.explanation: Spiritual growth comes from celebrating our differences while recognizing our fundamental interconnectedness.
teachings.practicalTip: Practice seeing the divine spark in every person you encounter today.

teachings.title: Compassionate Action
teachings.author: Heart Wisdom
teachings.quote: Small acts of love create ripples of healing that reach far beyond what we can see
teachings.explanation: Every compassionate action, no matter how small, contributes to the healing and upliftment of the collective consciousness.
teachings.practicalTip: Offer one genuine act of kindness each day, expecting nothing in return.
